Title: Silverlight Isolated Storage Cache
Description: IsoCache is a small framework the make it easy to store dll's and xap files in the isolated storage so they can be use to speed up the startup of the application.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

IsoCache is a small framework the make it easy to store dll's and xap files in the isolated storage so they can be use to speed up the startup of the application.

This project provide a framework that can be use to store xap files locally in Isolated Storage.
There is control of the local cache items throw designated manifest.
In the manifest will be list of items, versions etc.

Some of the benefits

  1. Common UX throw different browser and OOB.
  2. Can be used in OOB applications.
  3. Not depend on browser cache.

This project is in alfa stage.

Features

  • Controll versions throw manifest.
  • Parallel downloads
